== Ubuntu Feisty on DELL XPS 1210 (nvidia ship, webcam) ==
=== Installation ===
Since Feisty, evms causes "double swap" -> uninstall evms-ncurses evms libevms-2.5

__Webcam__: using uvcvideo, only work with v4l2<<BR>>
Driver: http://linux­uvc.berlios.de/
<pre>
sudo apt-­get install libpt­plugins­v4l2
svn checkout http://svn.berlios.de/svnroot/repos/linux­uvc/
cd linux­uvc/linux­uvc/trunk
make
sudo make install
modprobe uvcvideo
dmesg | tail
ln ­s /dev/video0 /dev/video
</pre>
Notes: Add users to system group "video"
